about.author: Author
about.introduction: This is a simple game developed to test Svelte
about.purpose: The goal is to progress in the adventure by clicking on actions. But you have only 100 clicks to do so. However after 100 clicks, you restart at the beginning but all previous clicks ar still triggering. So with all clicks cumulated it is possible to progress though the adventure.
about.title: {gameTitle}: about

howto.explanation:
For one run, you have 100 clicks.
For one click, you should choose an action. Some actions give you some ressources, and some other will unlock new actions.
Actions may have a cost in ressource to be clickable, and some may need several clicks on them to be completed.
howto.explanation2: Choosing some actions will complete the story.
howto.explanation3:
When you have clicked 100 times. The run is over and you have to restart from the begining.
But all clicks done in previous runs will continue to be applied on actions.
For example, for an action that needs 2 clicks: On run #1, you clicked on it at click #10 and click #11 (which complete the action). So at run #2, if you do the same action at click #10 then the action will be completed immediately. And at run #3, this action will be completed at click #10 even if you choosed another action.
This mechanism helps you to progress faster and consequently to go further in the story with only 100 clicks.
howto.title: {gameTitle}: How to play?

resources.lost-click--details: Lost clicks are clicks in previous run which are not able to repeat their actions

tuto1.explanation:
|justify|In this game you will have to finish the story by clicking on actions.
You will have only 100 clicks to finish the story.
It is short but you will have some help.|/justify|
tuto1.title: Welcome!

tuto2.explanation:
|justify|Actions are displayed in this area.
Most of them will appear when some other actions are complete.
A completed action will disappeared.

Some actions needs particular conditions to be completed. We will see this point later.

Each time you use an action, it will consume 1 click (:click:).|/justify|
tuto2.title: Actions

tuto3.explanation:
|justify|Above this area, there are pannels.

They display some information which can be useful to watch your progress in the story.

For example, you can see how many click you have already consummed for this run.
Don't be afraid about that, exploring (and so consuming clicks) are part of the game.

When you reached **100** clicks, the run is over. You will be able to start another one.

Some panels may appear when conditions are met.|/justify|
tuto3.title: Panels

tuto4.explanation:
|justify|Cost of actions are written at the top right.

By default, they cost 1 click (1 :click:). But for some actions you will need to click several times to fulfill the action.
Sometimes you will have a gain on each click, sometimes you will have the reward only when the action is complete.|/justify|
tuto4.nextStep: |center|Click on this action twice to continue|/center|
tuto4.title: Actions

tuto5.explanation:
|justify|Some actions have a cost in resources.

Resources depends on story and can be different for each story.

For example, this action needs 1 :point:
You need to produce this resource to continue the tutorial.

When using the action, the resource will be consumed.

If the action needs several clicks, the resource will be consumed for each click.|/justify|
tuto5.title: Actions

tuto6.description: Get 1 :usedPoint: and then click on this action to continue
tuto6.explanation:
|justify|Some actions may have requirement.
In such case, you will see the action but you cannot execute it while you don't have all requirements.

For example, to complete this action you need to have 1 :usedPoint:

Resources for the requirement will **not** be consumed.|/justify|
tuto6.title: Actions
